Bulk Mail Dispatching from the Command Line | Recently I was in need of sending a large quantity of emails to a pre-defined list of users. I wanted to do it on the command line–where I do most of my work–but unfortunately couldn’t find anything suitable for my needs so I created one: Maildis. — Posted 06 Dec 2012
